title: Publisher logo font
author: Jim Nicholson

comments.content:
No /S and modified /U:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182237im_/http:/typophile.com/files/subt1_4188.jpg)

Letterhead Fonts LHF/Brian Kniceley/Strong Nouveau LHF  
 [http://www.ufonts.com/download/lhf-strong-nouveau/171148.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182237/http:/www.ufonts.com/download/lhf-strong-nouveau/171148.html)

CastCraft Software/GiottoOpti  
 [http://opti.netii.net/fonts-g/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317182237/http:/opti.netii.net/fonts-g/index.htm)

Good finds Dick.  
The OPTI archive comments that Giotto is based on a font called Decorette. Presumably this is also the source for Strong Nouveau.  
Does anyone know anything about this "Decorette" font?  
Don
Dick, it’s not good for you to provide links to pirates sites.
